projects.title: DEVCON Bacolod
projects.subtitle: Leading the Local Tech Community
projects.summary: DEVCON Bacolod is a chapter of the Philippines' largest volunteer tech community. As Chapter Lead, I managed initiatives to promote collaborative growth for Filipino developers, providing platforms for learning, networking, and support.
metrics: Largest volunteer tech community in the Philippines
Promoted collaborative growth for developers
Provided platforms for learning and networking

projects.title: Armada Brands — Internship
projects.subtitle: E-Commerce Growth & D2C Brand Scaling
projects.summary: Interned at Armada Brands, a Singapore-headquartered e-commerce company acquiring promising digital-first D2C brands in Southeast Asia. Assisted in scaling partner brands like Nuprene and Goodies Nutrition through strategic resource allocation and creative operational support.
metrics: Supported scaling initiatives for D2C brands in SE Asia
Collaborated on brand strategy for Nuprene and Goodies Nutrition
Contributed to e-commerce operational workflows

projects.title: LA VIDA 2025 BRANDING
projects.subtitle: Event Promotion & Brand Identity for High-Energy Social Events
projects.summary: La Vida is an event organizing team specializing in high-energy social events, including rave parties, club nights, and themed gatherings. We manage all facets of event production—from venue selection and talent curation to logistics, technical production, and strategic promotion.
metrics: Comprehensive event production management
Strategic promotion and talent curation
Delivered impactful experiences like Elgon's Secret Garden Pool Party

projects.title: THE CAPITOL — Event Identity
projects.subtitle: A vibrant, youth-focused brand identity for a major city event.
projects.summary: Developed a comprehensive brand identity for 'The Capitol Party,' including logo, typography, color palette, and promotional materials.
metrics: 1,000+ event registrations within the first week
500k+ social media impressions
Secured 10+ local business sponsorships

projects.title: Custopia: VR Customer Service Simulator
projects.subtitle: The VR Game That Turns Training into a Thrilling Adventure
projects.summary: A cutting-edge virtual reality platform meticulously crafted to elevate customer service skills for young adults and professionals through immersive, real-life scenarios.
metrics: Finalist for Game Programming 2 Course Pitch
Integrated emotional intelligence tracking system
Simulated complex AI customer interactions

projects.title: CreateX by Artist Hub USLS
projects.subtitle: Beyond the Canvas: Shaping Artist Hub's Visual Narrative
projects.summary: Lead Designer for a series of art workshops for children held by the USLS Artists' Hub, weaving a visual tapestry that binds playful PLAYSHOP posters and sleek conference brochures.
metrics: Designed for diverse audiences (filmmakers to kids)
Collaborated with educators and artists
Created a kinetic energy through visual narrative

projects.title: Google Developer Events Branding
projects.subtitle: Connecting Communities through International, National, and Local Visuals
projects.summary: As a GDSC Lead and Co-Lead Creatives, I designed the visual identity for major Google events, bridging continents and cultures through impactful design and storytelling.
metrics: 800+ participants for DevFest 2023
30+ GDSC partners globally for Perennial
Nationwide reach for LAWIG Info Session

projects.title: Valtara: The Elemental's Quest
projects.subtitle: A 2D Platformer Game Where Platforming Meets Eco-Activism
projects.summary: Valtara is an action-adventure platformer set in a world on the brink of ecological collapse, designed to raise awareness about global environmental issues through immersive gameplay.
metrics: Applied CSP209 Game Programming 1 skills
Designed unique elemental ability swap system
Integrated environmental storytelling

projects.title: Pizzaporia: UI & UX Design Concept & Analysis
projects.subtitle: Elevating Mobile App UI/UX for an Emerging Platform
projects.summary: A comprehensive UI/UX overhaul of Pizzaporia, transforming a disjointed interface into an aesthetically-pleasing and seamless mobile experience focused on consistency and user goals.
metrics: Boosted engagement by simplifying order tracking
Achieved high accessibility with better color contrast
Reduced visual noise for a polished interface

projects.title: SmileIT Inc. — Web App Solution
projects.subtitle: Revamping SmileIT Computer Institute's Online Presence
projects.summary: As CEO and Lead UI/UX Designer, I spearheaded the digital transformation of SmileIT, crafting a professional MVP to democratize access to quality IT education in Bacolod City.
metrics: Successfully deployed professional MVP on Vercel
Collaborative effort with developer & research teams
Optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile responsiveness

projects.title: SaucyKPS Bot v1
projects.subtitle: Architectural Transformation of a Traditional Restaurant into a Telegram-Native Cloud Kitchen
projects.summary: A full-stack automation ecosystem that transforms a traditional restaurant into a 'Cloud Kitchen' model. By utilizing Telegram as the primary infrastructure, the project eliminates 20-30% commission fees typical of third-party delivery platforms while providing a professional, automated POS experience.
metrics: Eliminated 5-15 minute 'dead zone' in order processing
Reduced order-to-rider dispatch time to <1 second
Zero commission fees by bypassing third-party delivery platforms
Automated identity mapping eliminates manual customer data entry
Real-time receipt generation enhances customer trust

projects.title: GDG Bacolod Community Platform
projects.subtitle: Community-Driven Software for Developer Chapter Management
projects.summary: A web application built to serve as the digital home for the Google Developer Group (GDG) Bacolod chapter. This platform automates everyday community management tasks like certificate generation and event tracking.
metrics: Automated certificate generation saves time for organizers
Centralized archive preserves event history and moments
Offline-ready fallback for venues with poor connectivity
Multi-format certificate export (PNG & PDF)
Public validation portal for certificate verification

projects.title: Slick Store — Full‑Stack Sneaker Marketplace
projects.subtitle: A React + Supabase architecture study for sneaker resell flows
projects.summary: Slick Store is a full-stack e‑commerce prototype focused on the sneaker reselling space, exploring how to model products, variants, and orders in PostgreSQL while delivering a modern frontend experience.
metrics: Relational schema for products, variants, and orders in PostgreSQL
Inventory updates scoped to specific size variants
Supabase-backed authentication for shopper accounts
Cart and checkout flow connected to real database records
Client-side filters for brand, size, and price without full page reloads

projects.title: Capture Pixels — Photography Portfolio Platform
projects.subtitle: Engineering a Cinematic 3D Photography Ecosystem
projects.summary: A high-performance, full-stack photography portfolio designed to push the boundaries of modern web aesthetics. Built with Next.js 16 and React 19, the platform shifts away from static galleries toward a physics-based, interactive media experience.
metrics: 60fps 3D animations provide premium 'luxury' feel
Zero-friction content management workflow for non-technical users
Instant revalidation ensures global updates within milliseconds
High-performance Core Web Vitals (LCP/CLS) maintained
Secure admin dashboard with HTTP-only cookies and middleware protection

projects.title: Signalin: Accessibility App Concept
projects.subtitle: Helping Hearing & Speech Impaired Individuals Connect
projects.summary: As CEO and Project Manager, I developed Signalin to bridge communication gaps for the deaf and hard-of-hearing community, leading the project to become a regional startup finalist.
metrics: Finalist for the Regional Startup Challenge
Caters to an underserved accessibility demographic
Advocated for positive change through design

projects.title: DevFest 2023: Bacolod Tech Takeover
projects.subtitle: Hosting and Organizing Bacolod's Biggest Tech Event
projects.summary: As Acting President of DEVCON Bacolod and Co-Lead Creatives, I hosted Day 1 of DevFest 2023 and designed the main event visuals, celebrating a vibrant tech community of over 800 participants.
metrics: 800+ participants and curious passersby
Main event poster plastered across Ayala Malls
Guided sessions on AI, animation, and more

projects.title: UI/UX Analysis and Design for Existing Applications
projects.subtitle: Optimizing ILOVEUSAM, Metrobank, and Peddlr
projects.summary: Tasked with restyling and optimizing three popular apps, I leveraged expertise in layout and visual hierarchy to align them with modern design best practices and improve key metrics.
metrics: Improved first impressions for Metrobank login
Simplified service discovery for ILOVEUSAM
Uniform UI styles established across all platforms

projects.title: My Google Developer Journey
projects.subtitle: From a Team of Eight to a Global Force
projects.summary: Led the Google Developer Student Clubs at USLS from a small group to a global force, achieving unprecedented milestones in community building and international collaboration.
metrics: Grew membership from 8 to 150+ in one month
Organized 30+ events with 5,000+ participants
First chapter globally to host an International GDSC Collab

projects.title: Behind-the-Scenes: Event Poster Magic
projects.subtitle: A Design Duo's Journey in Crafting Creativity
projects.summary: A deep dive into the collaborative process between Leigh Andrew Eslawa and Gian Aibo, exploring how a blend of organized aesthetics and spontaneous creativity produces captivating brand-aligned posters.
metrics: Mentored a Design Officer to Lead Designer transition
Unified 4-color GDSC branding across all collateral
Executed 10+ high-impact international event posters

projects.title: THE MAKING OF GIAN AIBO 2026
projects.subtitle: Designing a World-Class Digital Experience
projects.summary: A meta-study on the engineering and design choices behind this very website. Combining Next.js 16, custom GLSL shaders, and MacOS-inspired glassmorphism to create a high-end digital experience.
metrics: Real-time GPU-based theme switching
Interactive 3D folder navigation system
Zero-flash theme persistence using sessionStorage
Sub-100ms interaction latency across all WebGL nodes

projects.title: your des(ai)gn
projects.subtitle: AI and creative tools — dark luxury interface
projects.summary: A premium digital environment built for creative tools, featuring a high-contrast dark interface, custom hardware-accelerated shaders, and precise typography. Implementation focuses on tactile feedback and high-performance animation.
